sn12.65:1.2: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.65:1.3: ‘kiccha vatayam loko apanno jayati ca jiyati ca miyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.65:1.4: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaranam nappajanati jaramaranassa.
sn12.65:1.5: Kudassu nama imassa dukkhassa nissaranam pannayissati jaramaranassa’ti?
sn12.65:1.7: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jaramaranam hoti, kimpaccaya jaramaranan’ti?
sn12.65:1.8: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:1.9: ‘jatiya kho sati jaramaranam hoti, jatipaccaya jaramaranan’ti.
sn12.65:2.11: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:2.12: ‘vinnane kho sati namarupam hoti, vinnanapaccaya namarupan’ti.
sn12.65:2.14: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vinnanam hoti, kimpaccaya vinnanan’ti?
sn12.65:2.15: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:2.16: ‘namarupe kho sati vinnanam hoti, namarupapaccaya vinnanan’ti.
sn12.65:3.2: paccudavattati kho idam vinnanam namarupamha na param gacchati.
sn12.65:3.3: Ettavata jayetha va jiyetha va miyetha va cavetha va upapajjetha va, yadidam namarupapaccaya vinnanam;
sn12.65:3.8: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi nanam udapadi panna udapadi vijja udapadi aloko udapadi.
sn12.65:4.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati, jaramaranam na hoti;
sn12.65:4.4: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:4.8: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jati na hoti …pe…
sn12.65:4.17: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vinnanam na hoti;
sn12.65:5.4: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:6.2: adhigato kho myayam maggo bodhaya yadidam—
sn12.65:6.8: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi nanam udapadi panna udapadi vijja udapadi aloko udapadi.
sn12.65:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso aranne pavane caramano passeyya puranam maggam purananjasam pubbakehi manussehi anuyatam.
sn12.65:7.3: Tamanugacchanto passeyya puranam nagaram puranam rajadhanim pubbakehi manussehi ajjhavuttham aramasampannam vanasampannam pokkharanisampannam uddhapavantam ramaniyam.
sn12.65:7.4: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso ranno va rajamahamattassa va aroceyya:
sn12.65:7.5: ‘yagghe, bhante, janeyyasi—aham addasam aranne pavane caramano puranam maggam purananjasam pubbakehi manussehi anuyatam tamanugacchim.
sn12.65:7.6: Tamanugacchanto addasam puranam nagaram puranam rajadhanim pubbakehi manussehi ajjhavuttham aramasampannam vanasampannam pokkharanisampannam uddhapavantam ramaniyam.
sn12.65:7.8: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, raja va rajamahamatto va tam nagaram mapeyya.
sn12.65:7.9: Tadassa nagaram aparena samayena iddhanceva phitanca bahujannam akinnamanussam vuddhivepullappattam.
sn12.65:7.10: Evameva khvaham, bhikkhave, addasam puranam maggam purananjasam pubbakehi sammasambuddhehi anuyatam.
sn12.65:8.1: Katamo ca so, bhikkhave, puranamaggo purananjaso pubbakehi sammasambuddhehi anuyato?
sn12.65:8.4: Ayam kho so, bhikkhave, puranamaggo purananjaso pubbakehi sammasambuddhehi anuyato, tamanugacchim;
sn12.65:8.24: Tadabhinnaya acikkhim bhikkhunam bhikkhuninam upasakanam upasikanam.
sn12.65:8.25: Tayidam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam iddhanceva phitanca vittharikam bahujannam puthubhutam yava devamanussehi suppakasitan”ti.
